price: 小腿被揭露之日，他们将被召去叩头，而他们不能〔叩头〕。
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُكۡشَفُ عَن سَاقٖ وَيُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: yawma yuk'shafu ʿan sāqin wayud'ʿawna ilā al-sujūdi falā yastaṭīʿūna
